en: Is there any ongoing construction work or road repairs that might impact my journey?
What is the current condition of the road surface? Are there any potholes or rough patches to be aware of?
How is the visibility on the road right now? Are there any poorly lit areas?
Could you inform me about any special lanes, like HOV or bicycle lanes, on my route?
Is there notable pedestrian or cyclist activity along my route that I should be cautious of?
Are there any road closures or detours in place today?
RoadTalk, are there any traffic jams or slowdowns on my route today?
